The Special Fish
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Monsters: The Special Fish
By Tigerbubble on Friday, March 15, 2002 - 06:25 pm:

I don't know who has noticed this, but all rare breeds as well as all default monsters (monsters that you obtained through evolving or saucer stone pieces, rather than from a CD or DVD) have stats that end in multiples of 5. All except 1. Lovina (ogyo/?) has a starting intelligence of 146.

This isn't exactly important, but interresting none the less.

By Khift on Saturday, March 16, 2002 - 08:58 am:

Hmm. Never noticed that. Interesting.

By Otheous on Saturday, March 16, 2002 - 12:10 pm:

I think Breeza (ogyo/brilla) has a base life of 119 or something.

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, March 16, 2002 - 12:13 pm:

Lisa whips out her strategy guide, and, yep Breeza has 119 in Life. Those crazy, living on the edge, Ogyos!

By torey_luvullo on Saturday, March 16, 2002 - 05:18 pm:

i remember in compiling the tech charts, how most other monsters had regular gains of 1,2 or 3 in one or two categories. ogyo's gains as her techs level up is a crazy quilt of gains in a different mixture of categories...
